block_comment: This code block configures test signal inversions based on a test case input. It uses conditional assignment to determine the value of `test_dir_invert` based on the `PAIR_BIR` condition and directly assigns `test_value_invert` from `test_case[0]`. Specifically, `test_dir_invert` is set to `test_case[1]` when `PAIR_BIR` is true; otherwise, it is set to `0`. This setup allows dynamic inversion control of test signals depending on the configuration specified by `test_case`.
